steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Package with rsyslog must be on system

data.command: if #{package_checker} > /dev/null; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Package with rsyslog must be on system

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Package with rsyslog must be on system

data.command: if #{package_checker} > /dev/null; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi

input_arguments.name: package_installer
input_arguments.description: Package installer command for linux. Default yum
input_arguments.value: (which yum && yum -y install epel-release rsyslog)||(which apt-get && apt-get install -y rsyslog)

input_arguments.name: flavor_command
input_arguments.description: Command to disable syslog collection. Default newer rsyslog commands. i.e older command = service rsyslog stop ; chkconfig off rsyslog
input_arguments.value: systemctl stop rsyslog ; systemctl disable rsyslog

input_arguments.name: cleanup_command
input_arguments.description: Command to enable syslog collection. Default newer rsyslog commands. i.e older command = service rsyslog start ; chkconfig rsyslog on
input_arguments.value: systemctl start rsyslog ; systemctl enable rsyslog
